content:
I encountered an error when i was using REPL to verify a proof written by lean-smt. The proof can be correctly compiled in the infoview, but it crashes in repl. It seems that the error occurs at here: https://github.com/leanprover-community/repl/blob/v4.15.0/REPL/Main.lean#L200. Is there any difference about executing lean code between the infoview and repl?
image.png
Wang ZiHan has marked this topic as resolved.
